analysis: The project is a test website focused on black holes with a theme that includes animated objects and slides. The current files suggest a need for a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be completed with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. The CSS file should be updated with Egyptian-themed color palettes and UI elements, and the JavaScript file needs to be fixed for syntax errors and improved mobile menu toggle functionality.

improvements.description: Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.

Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Also, update with Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html.
